S-girl,

Love the new Saitou painting.  Very cool sort of "in motion" effect.  :D 
:D

You said you would like a reference for the gatotsu.  There is this little 
page, here, which runs through the steps of the moves.  I always thought 
it was very helpful to me in writing action scenes where Saitou is 
involved, so I thought it might be helpful to you, too.

http://www.geocities.com/pure_saiyajin/gatotsu.html

(You may have to scroll down.)

Anyway, if you get up and do the steps as per the instructions, it seems 
to be about right.  :D

Angrybee.
